name: Ref. Case Com. ASHP (RST) CC
_description: Typical size light commercial rooftop HP unit with reference case performance (counterfactual), cold-climate

market_entry_year_source.notes: Assume historical measure penetration is captured in baseline

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Reflect performance level of 2023 minimum efficiency standard, which is reflected in the 2030 column of EIA projections

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

installed_cost_source.notes: Typical installed cost in 2030 divided by typical capacity (90 kBtu/h cooling); 2030 reflects implementation of standard in 2023

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

market_scaling_fractions_source.title: CBECS 2012 - Table B30 -  Cooling energy sources, number of buildings and floorspace
market_scaling_fractions_source.fraction_derivation: Cooling fraction excludes cooling in buildings that use non-electric source of primary heating (25,613 sf/ 79,294 sf).
